UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Associating Biological Activity and Predicted Structure of Antimicrobial Peptides from Amphibians and Insects.
Literature.Author: Ebrahimikondori H, Babcock A, Louie N, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µg/ml)
